title: LF 5's Ranked. Around Gold +/-
body: Hey Guys, I'm a gold rated player, just looking for a bit of a step up from solo queue. Trying to assemble a team just to have a good time and play a bit more seriously with a bit of strategy. Just poking the puddle with a stick to see if there are more people like myself looking for something more than just solo queue. Feel free to post and if someone has room for me on a team lemme know . thanks Team! I play all solo roles.
